properties.entry: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_BODY = ? WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
